response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, it's worth more than $10,000 to us. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
